title: SEM characterisation
description: SEM characterisation workflow of cement samples

title: Sawing
description: Extraction of SEM sample from the casted sement by sawing

title: Coating
description: Coating the SEM sample with carbon to make it electrical conducting

title: SEM parameter setup
description: Select high tension, detectors, apartures, etc

title: SEM Measurement process
description: Acquire BSE images and EDS maps

title: BSE pre-processing
description: Filter the BSE image and adjust contrast.

title: BSE clustering
description: Cluster the combined BSE image and EDS map

title: EDS quantification
description: Use EDS map to quantify chemical composition.
